channel.title: Glitch!
channel.description:
i was on runescape today, and i happend to go to a party at a house with a combat ring. i was attacking some noobs and then i noticed that my auto relate was off. just as i turned it on, i died. right after that i noticed there was an extra option on players that said "attack" i was like SWEET!!!!!!!!! but it said, you cannot attack out of combat ring. i was hopeing that maybe some poeple could help and we could bring this glitch to the fullest and we could make a massive attack on runescape. if you want, the next time your on runescape, try it out, tell me how it worked, and hopefully we could make one heck of a glitch kinda like the 6/6/06 attack!
just try it out, tell me how it was, and if you find anything new, tell me.

item.title: Glitch!
item.dc:creator: @O_M_F_G O M F G
item.description:
@O_M_F_G wrote:

I still think this thread is a plain rip off of my awsome report(most of the threads I make are realy long or awsome in some other way, like what schools have come to in the hw section),but since the subject is tilting here’s another glitch. Put on boxing gloves, sit in a rocking chair, equip wep and shield while sitting in it, you’ll be carying the wep and shield above your headwhen you get up. I don’t think they fixed this,but it’s one of the oldest construction glitches. Also, the Demon butler does not store your items in the end of the bank,but somewhere in the middle…When you get out of the pit below the throne room your still in the same position and only half of you is visible.

Read full topic

item.title: Glitch!
item.dc:creator: @dave5534 dave5534
item.description:
@dave5534 wrote:

the giltch is easy you need to sit then follow some one in a comabt ring then eat as fast as u can then you can move around the house until the owner logs out then u can move out side the house.

Read full topic

item.title: Glitch!
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

[quote=“g00dg0d, post:6, topic:34489”]Nothing really. You sit down and then someone boots you from their house and your still sitting there. Or you tele. And before there was a way to move.

But on topic: your not an awesome haxor or anything for doing that. Anyone can and you wont be able to attack anyone because the server knows attacking someone where your not supposed to is bull shit.[/quote]

Go sit down ON A BENCH in someones house, put on the house options menu, and tell them to expell you.

Then tell me if they fixed it

Read full topic

item.title: Glitch!
item.dc:creator: @g00dg0d g00dg0d
item.description:
@g00dg0d wrote:

Nothing really. You sit down and then someone boots you from their house and your still sitting there. Or you tele. And before there was a way to move.

But on topic: your not an awesome haxor or anything for doing that. Anyone can and you wont be able to attack anyone because the server knows attacking someone where your not supposed to is bull shit.

Read full topic

i was on runescape today, and i happend to go to a party at a house with a combat ring.
i was attacking some noobs and then i noticed that my auto relate was off.
just as i turned it on, i died.
right after that i noticed there was an extra option on players that said “attack” i was like SWEET!!!

i was hopeing that maybe some poeple could help and we could bring this glitch to the fullest and we could make a massive attack on runescape.
